SELECT LIST.* FROM ( SELECT BOU.UserCode AS "UR_Code" ,CASE WHEN ((select COUNT(*) from jwf_signimage JS WHERE JS.UserCode = BOU.UserCode) > 0) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "USER_SIGN" ,BOU.DisplayName AS "UR_Name" ,BG.DeptName AS "DEPT_Name" ,BG.JobLevelName AS "JobLevelName" ,BG.JobTitleName AS "JobTitleName" ,BG.JobPositionName AS "JobPositionName" ,BG.DeptCode AS "DEPT_Code" ,BG.CompanyCode AS "EntCode" FROM sys_object_user BOU INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup BG ON BOU.UserCode = BG.UserCode WHERE BOU.IsUse = 'Y' ) LIST
"EntCode"=#{EntCode}
AND
"UR_Code" "UR_Name" "DEPT_Name"
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ( "UR_Code" LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR "UR_Name" LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR "DEPT_Name" LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' )
"UR_Code" "UR_Name" "JobTitleName" "JobLevelName" "USER_SIGN" "DEPT_Name"
ASC DESC

"EntCode"=#{EntCode}
AND
"UR_Code" "UR_Name" "DEPT_Name"

SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT UserCode AS "UserCode" , Seq AS "Seq" , FileName AS "FileName" , IsUse AS "IsUse" , SortKey AS "SortKey" , TO_CHAR(InsertDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "InsertDate" , FilePath AS "FilePath" FROM jwf_signimage WHERE UserCode = #{UserCode} AND IsUse = #{IsUse} ORDER BY InsertDate ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
